title: COA
desc: Authored a complete series of Coat of Arms designs using a Generative AI-assisted workflow (ComfyUI, Flux), integrating AI outputs with manual refinement for dynamic in-game assets.

title: GOG
desc: Legacy UI/UX created in Figma. Developed comprehensive design systems and visual assets contributing to the overall art direction.

title: UI-UX
desc: Animated high-fidelity prototypes demonstrating complex interaction flows and micro-animations for game interfaces.

title: Veras AI
desc: Lead brand designer responsible for UI/UX and web interfaces, developing a strong foundation in visual design principles.

title: Logo Design
desc: Concept logo designs and brand mockups completed in 3 days. Delivered 5 distinct logo concepts and brand mockups for RIVOS.

title: Motion
desc: A collection of Academic 2D/3D animations and motion graphics exploring digital art and emerging technologies.

title: Latent Games
desc: 2D platformer games focusing on fluid mechanics and responsive controls, built with WEBGL and Three.js.

title: Artifice
desc: A series of generative landscapes created using custom Stable Diffusion models and detailed prompt engineering.

title: Design Thinking
desc: An in-depth study of Human-Computer Interaction patterns, focusing on accessibility and intuitive navigation.
